SELECT GRS_EV_SN AS grsEvSn -- GRS 일련번호 ,GRS_EV_SEQ AS grsEvSeq -- GRS 순번 ,EV_PRVS_NM_1 AS evPrvsNm_1 -- 평가항목명1 ,EV_PRVS_NM_2 AS evPrvsNm_2 -- 평가항목명2 ,EV_CRTN_NM AS evCrtnNm -- 평가기준명 ,EV_SBC_TXT AS evSbcTxt -- 평가내용 ,DTL_SBC_TITL_1 AS dtlSbcTitl_1 -- 상세내용1 ,DTL_SBC_TITL_2 AS dtlSbcTitl_2 -- 상세내용2 ,DTL_SBC_TITL_3 AS dtlSbcTitl_3 -- 상세내용3 ,DTL_SBC_TITL_4 AS dtlSbcTitl_4 -- 상세내용4 ,DTL_SBC_TITL_5 AS dtlSbcTitl_5 -- 상세내용5 ,WGVL AS wgvl -- 가중치 ,GRS_Y AS grsY -- 년도 ,GRS_TYPE AS grsType -- 유형 ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('GRS_TYPE',GRS_TYPE) grsTypeNm --유형명 ,EV_SBC_NM AS evSbcNm -- 템플릿명 ,USE_YN AS useYn -- 사용여부 ,FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt -- 최초등록일시 ,FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId -- 최초등록자 ,LAST_MDFY_DT AS lastMdfyDt -- 최종수정일시 ,LAST_MDFY_ID AS lastMdfyId -- 최종수정자
FROM IRIS_GRS_EV_STD_MGMT
WHERE 1=1
AND (USE_YN = 'Y' or USE_YN is null or USE_YN = '')
AND GRS_EV_SEQ = 0
AND GRS_EV_SN = '${grsEvSn}' AND GRS_EV_SEQ != 0
AND GRS_TYPE = '${grsType}'
AND EV_SBC_NM like '%${evSbcNm}%'
AND GRS_Y = '${grsY}'
AND USE_YN = '${useYn}'
ORDER BY GRS_Y DESC
